summary: This bill, the Further Additional Continuing Appropriations and Other Extensions Act, 2025, extends various funding and programs. It includes further appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2025 for areas such as defense, disaster relief (FEMA), and the Office of Navajo and Hopi Relocation. It also extends numerous health-related programs like community health centers, telehealth services, and Medicare provisions. Extensions related to human services such as sexual risk avoidance education and personal responsibility programs are included, along with miscellaneous extensions like the CFTC whistleblower program and cybersecurity authorizations. Finally, it outlines budgetary effects, specifying that its impacts won't be entered on various PAYGO scorecards.
